loans.use: to buy equipment like massagers and creams in order to provide a better service and to be able to keep her service afloat.

loans.name: Rey

texts.en:
Rey is a 24-year-old single son who lives in a community in the Kampong Chhnang province in Cambodia. On the weekend, he studies as an accounting major in his first year at a university in the province. From Monday to Friday, Rey works as a construction worker, earning a daily income of USD $5. 

His parents are farmers who earn their main income from vegetable farming and the business of buying and selling cattle. 

He is now lacking the finances to cover his university fees from his first through his fourth year, so he would like to take out a Kiva loan through the KREDIT MFI. This loan will help him have enough finances for earning a bachelor’s degree with skills for his future job. After graduation, he dreams of working in any company or institution.

loans.use: to cover his university fees from his first through his fourth year.

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama is a 25-year-old single man from Deir Albalah City. He lives with his family in a small house. He works in the public sector. Osama would like to improve his family's living conditions, and buy all the necessities for them.

Osama took a Murabaha loan from FATEN that will be used to help him to buy a solar system for heating water. This will allow him to provide hot water for his family without using electricity.

Osama appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water.

loans.name: Abdl-Salam

texts.en:
Abdl-Salam is a 24-year-old single man from Deir Albalah City. He lives with his family in a small house. He works in the public sector. Abdl would like to improve his family's living conditions and buy all the necessities for them.

Abdl took a loan from FATEN that will be used to help him to buy a solar system and water filter. This will allow him to provide hot and clean water for his family without using electricity.

Abdl appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system  and water filter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy matooke (bananas) to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feed, canned goods, noodles, shampoo, conditioner, sugar and chips

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow to supply milk with his motorcycle for more income gain.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is a farmer living in Hnaberd village in Ararat region.
 
Anna's family members are hardworking people and they have never avoided the difficulties that are part of the agricultural business. Anna's husband is a migrant worker, and she currently lives with her mother-in-law and three children (20-year-old daughter, 16-year-old and 11-years old son). On the farm, the family keeps four cows, two pigs, seven calves and eight chickens.  They also cultivate wheat and potatoes. Anna now decided to purchase more cattle and develop her farm. For that reason, she asks for a loan from Kiva and hopes that this new loan will be successful for her.
 
Because the region where their village is located is considered poor, and the unemployment rate here is very high, people face numerous difficulties in developing their businesses. Anna's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the under-served population of the Shirak region, to help them to access the market and earn a living. Anna hopes to receive lenders' support and enlarge her agribusiness, so her husband will be able to come back to his family.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, a cow and two piglets

loans.name: Nongtaaba De Avv Watinoma Group

texts.fr:
Mr YACOUBA est responsable du groupe NONGTAABA DE AVV WATINOMA. Marié, il est père de 05enfants. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins âgé à 02ans. Il a 07personnes en charge.
Mr fait l'élevage depuis 10ans. Il s'approvisionne au marché de son village.
Il veut s'acheter 03moutons.
Il veut scolariser ses enfants avec ses bénéfices. Il ambitionne construire une maison d'habitation.
texts.en:
Yacouba is the representative of the 'Nongtaaba De Avv Watinoma' Group.  He is married and father to five children.  The eldest is twenty years old and the youngest is two years old.  In total, he is responsible for seven people.

Yacouba has been rearing livestock for ten years.  He buys his animals from the village market and plans to use his loan to buy three sheep.

The profits generated by this loan will pay for schooling for his children.  In the future, Yacouba would like to build a house to live in.

loans.use: to buy three sheep.

loans.name: Wendpanga Hamidou Group

texts.fr:
Mr HAMIDOU est responsable du groupe WENDPANGA HAMIDOU. Marié, il est père de 05enfants. Le plus âgé a19ans et le moins âgé à 08ans. 03 vont à l'école. Il a 06personnes en charge.
Mr fait le maraichage depuis 10ans. Il s'approvisionne au barrage de mogtedo.
Il veut s'acheter 10sacs d'engrais et 08boites d'herbicide.
Il veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Il ambitionne scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Hamidou is the representative of the 'Wendpanga Hamidou' Group.  He is married and is father to five children.  The eldest is nineteen years old and the youngest is eight years old.  Three of his children attend school.  In total, he is responsible for six people.

Hamidou has been growing vegetables for ten years.  He buys his supplies at the Mogtedo Dam and plans to use his loan to buy ten sacks of fertilizer and eight boxes of herbicide.

Hamidou's profits will be reinvested in his business and his aim is to pay for schooling for his children.

loans.use: to buy 10 sacks of fertilizer and 8 boxes of herbicide for his farming business.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: A 35 ans, Akouvi est une femme veuve et avec ses cinq enfants elle vit dans le quartier d’Attiegou. Restauratrice, Akouvi est une revendeuse de pate bandée et s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Akouvi réalise une très bonne rentabilité avec son activité génératrice de revenu. Akouvi nécessite ce crédit pour acheter des sacs de maïs, du charbon et des épices afin de gagner plus de bénéfices et venir en aide à l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Akouvi is 35 years old, widowed and has five children.  She lives in the Attiegou district and runs a restaurant business.  She makes maize mash and buys her supplies once a month from the market.  

Although Akouvi makes a good profit from her business, she has requested this loan to buy sacks of maize, spices and charcoal.  The profits made from her business will be used to pay for schooling for her children.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of maize, 2 bowls of spices and a small sack of charcoal for her food production business.

loans.name: Mansah

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 23 ans, Mansah est une femme qui vit à Attiegou avec ses deux enfants. Au marché et dans son quartier, Mansah vend des couches bébés et des pommades de beauté  à ses clients et trouve son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Mansah s’approvisionne deux fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Mansah demande ce crédit pour commander des couches et des pommades et réaliser encore plus de revenus pour aider son mari à subvenir aux charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Mansah is 23 years old and lives in Attiegou with her two children.  She sells babies' nappies and beauty creams at the market and in her local area.  She buys new supplies twice a month to maintain her stock levels.

Mansah's loan will be used to buy more nappies and creams and increase her profits.  These will help her husband to provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy 8 dozen nappies and 30 bottles of cream.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi est femme mariée qui est âgée de 32 ans Elle vit à Attiegou avec ses deux enfants. Akouvi vend des produits d’alimentations générales et des poissons fumés dans son quartier pour avoir son revenu. Ce commerce lui procure une rentabilité nécessaire pour assurer la survie quotidienne de ses enfants et leur éducation. Akouvi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter des petits poissons,  Akouvi demande ce prêt pour la réalisation de son objectif et augmenter sa rentabilité.
texts.en:
Akouvi is 32 years old, married and lives in Attiegou with her two children.  She sells food products and smoked fish in her local area to earn a living.  This enables her to provide enough for the day-to-day needs of her children and their education.

She buys her supplies twice a month from the market and this loan will be used to buy small fish.  In this way she hopes to be able to achieve her aims and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy 20 quantities of fish for resale.

loans.name: Azalsho

texts.ru: Азалшо доброжелательный пожилой мужчина в возрасте 58 лет. У него трое  детей и заботливая жена. Они живут в городе. Азалшо работает в школе. Всё что он зарабатывает уходит на проживание семьи и он никак не может накопить денег для других цель. В его семье намечается мероприятие. Для проведение этого мероприятия он должен покупать подарки для своих внуков, детей, невест и родственников, но у него не хватает денежных средств и для этого он обратился  в МДО Арванд за получение кредита для проведение мероприятия и заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Azalsho is a kind-hearted, middle-aged man.  He is 58 years old.  He has three children and a caring wife.  He lives in the city and works in a school.  All the money he makes is spent to take care of his family and he is in no position to save any money for any other goal.

The family is getting ready to celebrate an important event and Azalsho needs to buy gifts for his grandchildren, children, for the bride and other relatives.  However, he doesn't have enough money and, for this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand to receive a loan and hold the event.  He thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support and their trust.

loans.use: to buy gifts for a family event.

loans.name: Somiyehalo

texts.fr: Agée de 54 ans, Somiyehalo est une femme qui vit à Attiegou avec cinq  personnes à sa charge.  Pour avoir son revenu, Somiyehalo prépare et vend de la boisson locale communément appelée Tchoukoutchou faite à base du mil. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Somiyehalo s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Somiyehalo demande ce crédit pour commander des bols de mil afin de réaliser encore plus de revenus pour soutenir  les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Somiyehalo is 54 years old, lives in Attiegou and is responsible for a total of five people.  She prepares and sells a drink known locally as Tchoukoutchou.  This is made using millet and Somiyehalo buys her supplies once a month from the market.

Somiyehalo has requested this loan to buy bowls of maize and increase her earnings so she can pay for the day-to-day expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy 50 bowls of millet for her drink making business.

loans.name: Eleossi

texts.fr: Eleossi vit à Nukafu et est âgée de 46 ans. Célibataire, Eleossi vit seul et travaille activement pour gagner sa vie. Eleossi vend des produits de commerce général dans son quartier pour avoir son revenu de subsistance. Eleossi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des détergents et des papiers hygiéniques, Eleossi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et tirer sa rentabilité nécessaire.
texts.en:
Eleossi lives in Nukafu.  She is 46 years old, single, lives alone and works hard to support herself.  She sells general household products in her local area and earns a subsistance living.

Eleossi buys new supplies four times a month from the market.  Her loan will buy detergents and toilet paper and will increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy 14 packets of detergent and 11 packets of toilet paper for sale in her shop.

loans.name: Dovi

texts.fr: Agée de 47 ans et mère de trois enfants, Dovi est une femme mariée qui vit à Attiégou avec sa famille. Dovi vend des charbons de bois dans son quartier et gagne une bonne rentabilité dans son activité. Dovi s’approvisionne au marché deux fois par mois. Pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois, Dovi souhaite ce crédit pour réaliser sa commande et tirer une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour venir en aide aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en:
Dovi is 47 years old, married and mother to three children.  She lives in Attiégou with her family.

Dovi sells charcoal in her neighbourhood and earns a good living.  She buys her supplies twice a month from the market and will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal.  Her increased profits will allow her to provide for the day-to-day needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 5 sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Apélété

texts.fr: Apélété est un homme célibataire et âgé de 33 ans. Il habite le quartier de Tokoin. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Apélété est un cordonnier qui fabrique et vend des chaussures de peau. Grâce à cette activité, Apélété arrive à trouver une épargne et s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des plaques de semelles, des colles et des matériaux pour la fabrication, Apélété demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et améliorer ses prestations afin d’augmenter son profit.
texts.en:
Apélété is 33 years old, single and lives in Tokoin.  In order to earn a living, he makes and sells leather shoes.  He manages to earn enough to have some savings, so buys new supplies only once a month from the market.

Apélété has requested this loan to buy shoe soles, glue and other production materials.  He intends to expand the range of shoes that he sells and hopes this will increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy 2 sheets of shoe soles, 2 boxes of glue and 8 sheets of animal leather to make shoes.

loans.name: Tchotcho

texts.fr: Tchotcho est une femme mariée âgée de 44 ans. Tchotcho qui vit à Tokoin avec un enfant à sa charge. Elle travaille  activement pour son épanouissement. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Tchotcho cuit des arachides à base des noix de coco qu’elle embouteille pour vendre afin d’avoir son bénéfice. Tchotcho achète ses provisions une fois par mois sur un marché local du quartier. Pour commander des bols d’arachides fraiches, un bidon d’huile et un tas de noix de coco , Tchotcho demande ce nouveau crédit pour réaliser son achat et tirer plus de bénéfice pour promouvoir l’éducation de son enfant.
texts.en:
Tchotcho is 44 years old, married and lives in Tokoin with her child.  She works hard to provide a better life for her family.  She roasts peanuts and coconut which she then bottles and sells.  Her supplies come from the local market once a month.

Tchotcho has requested this loan to buy raw peanuts, a drum of oil and a quantity of coconuts.  Her profits will pay for education for her child.

loans.use: to buy 26 bowls of peanuts, 1 drum of oil and 1 quantity of coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Zhyldyz

texts.ru: Жылдыз, 32 года, замужем, мать 5 дочерей, мечтает о сыне. У Жылдыз среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она уже много лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Жылдыз, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: корова, бычок, лошадь. Также есть земельный надел мерою 2,50 ГА, где она выращивает пшеницу. Ежемесячный доход Жылдыз составляет около 3,000 сом (KGS). Жылдыз обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) для закупки овец. Жылдыз намерена и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота и развивать ее бизнес.
texts.en: Zhyldyz is 32 years old and married.  She is the mother of five girls and she is dreaming of a baby boy. She has a secondary education and, for many years already, she has been involved in agriculture and animal husbandry, two activities which constitute the family's main source of income.  Thanks to her perseverance, dedication and hard work, she currently has one cow, one young bull and one horse.  She also grows wheat on 2.5 hectares of land.  She makes a monthly income of about 3,000 som (KGS).  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 15,000 som (KGS) to buy a few sheep.  Zhyldyz intends to further increase her livestock headcount and to develop her business.

loans.use: to buy some sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Raushan

texts.ru: Раушан, 41 год, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Раушан средне-специальное образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 7 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Раушан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 6 коров, 50 овец и 10 лошадей, также она выращивает на арендованном участке мерою 4,0 Га и собственном участке мерою 3,60 ГА картофель, люцерну и ячмень. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян и для обработки почвы для выращивания органических сельскохозяйственных продуктов. Доходы от кредита Раушан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Raushan is 41 years old, married, and she has three children.  She has a specialized secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which provide a source of income for her family.  She started in this field seven years ago.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has six cows, 50 sheep and 10 horses.  She also grows potatoes, alfalfa and barley on four hectares of leased land and 3.6 hectares of her own land.  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds and to prepare her land to cultivate organic crops.  She is planning to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further growing her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and to prepare her land to cultivate organic crops.

loans.name: Shirley Del Socorro

texts.es:
Shirley es madre de una hija de 6 años de edad; desde hace aproximadamente 4 años se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos como ropa, perfumería, cremas corporales, accesorios, entre otros y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor como blusas, jeans, zapatos, accesorios, perfumería, entre otros, así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada.

Shirley, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un local comercial donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a su hija una excelente educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Shirley is the mother of a six-year-old daughter and has been working as a self-taught independent merchant for around four years to support her family.  She sells all kinds of clothing, perfumes, body lotions, accessories, and other items, meeting new customers every day and increasing sales.

The loan she is currently requesting is to buy wholesale merchandise such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, perfumes, etc., to stock more variety to satisfy the increased demand this season. 

With drive and dedication, Shirley wants to continue working so her business will prosper.  In the near future she hopes to open a shop in a local shopping center and offer a wider variety of goods.  This will increase profitability and economic stability which will allow for an excellent education and better quality of life for her daughter.

loans.use: To buy wholesale merchandise such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es una persona muy simpática y siempre tiene una sonrisa para los clientes que visitan su tienda de abarrotes en el municipio de Medellín.

Gracias a su carisma y buen humor se ha podido ganar el corazón y reconocimiento de las personas del sector que siempre prefieren visitar su tienda para adquirir sus productos.

Todos los días trabaja para tener un excelente futuro.
Trabaja con 2 empleados durante 15 horas todos los días.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar como granos, abarrotes, golosinas, bebidas, entre otros y de esta forma darle un impulso significativo a su negocio.

El guarda la esperanza de poder continuar con su negocio y así seguir impactando la vida de sus clientes a través de su buen servicio.
texts.en:
Luis is a very nice person who always has a smile for the customers who shop in his grocery store in the city of Medellin.  Thanks to his charisma and good humor he has won the hearts and recognition of people in the sector who always prefer his store when shopping for products.

He works every day toward an excellent future and employs two people 15 hours a day.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy a variety of staple goods such as grains, groceries, sweets, beverages, etc. to significantly boost his business.

He hopes to continue his business and keep making a difference in his customers' lives through his good service.

loans.use: To buy a variety of staple goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To renovate the infrastructure of his house where he keeps his tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy creams, lotions, deodorants, makeup, etc.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 42 años de edad, es  padre de dos niños de las edades entre 12 y 6 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Para Pedro no hay nada más importante de que su familia es por ello que para darles lo mejor se dedica a la agricultura el desde hace 25 años realiza esta labor, sus años de experiencia lo ayuda  mucho a producir buenas verduras.
Pedro desde hace algún tiempo había sembrado unas cuerdas de cebolla que ahora ya necesitan de su mantenimiento, pero a pesar de todos sus esfuerzos  no le es posible comprar  sus fertilizantes para el mantenimiento, por tal razón solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir esta necesidad que su cultivo tiene.
El gran sueño de Pedro es poder compra más terreno para incrementar su cultivo y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro, 42, has two children, ages 12 and 6.  His humble family lives in the community of Solola.  There is nothing more important to Pedro than his family; so to give them the best he can he has worked in agriculture for 25 years.  His years of experience help him to produce quality vegetables.

For some time now Pedro has been growing onions which are now in need of maintenance.  Despite all his efforts he is unable to buy the fertilizers he needs for this and therefore he is requesting a loan to make the purchase.

Pedro's greatest wish is to be able to buy more land and increase his crop activity as well as improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his onion crop.

loans.name: Ireen

texts.en:
Ireen is 37 years old, married to Zephaniah and she supports six children. 

She has been a farmer to clients for the last eight years and the business earns her KES 10,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops on her farm in order to realize more profits.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and expand her agricultural sector. 

Her hope is to be financially stable and educate her children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops on her farm in order to realize more profits

loans.name: Veranika

texts.en:
Veranika is 53 and has been photographed with her five-year-old daughter in front of an unfinished animal stable for which she needs this loan. She is married and has two other children, 23 and 18 years old.

Livestock has been her activity for the past almost 20 years. She’s been raising animals and selling raw milk to a nearby dairy farm. Some dairy products she makes herself and sells a calf/year. She also has 10 sows from which she sells approximately 60 piglets/year. On the land that she owns, she plants only feed for her animals. While livestock has been the only source of income for their family, her 23-year-old son owns a motorized reaper and he is often called from other villagers to offer reaping services.  “It’s lots of work with the pigs, because there are so many piglets every year that I have to take care of and every year I have to start all over again, from the minute they are born to the minute I sell them,” said Veranika to her loan officer who met with her in the field.

loans.use: to cover the animal stable seen in the background of the photograph that fits about 70 animals inside

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 44-year-old divorced mother of three children. Three years ago, she started baking "markouk", which is a special kind of bread, to cover her family's needs and expenses. She is her family's only breadwinner.

Hanan is an ambitious woman and sacrificing mother. She succeeded throughout the years to gain loyal customers with her professional skills. She is also trying desperately to improve her family with better living conditions. Thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her son's school tuition fees.

Hanan hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and be able to satisfy her children's needs.

loans.use: to pay her son's school tuition fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soda, beer and spirits to sell

loans.name: 09- Thiệu Lý  Poverty Reduction Group

texts.en:
Mrs Phương is 30 years old and she is married. She has had a service business, shipping goods, for one year. 

Phương lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village, and the market need is low in this region.
 
This is Phương's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She and the other members established "09- Thiệu Lý  Poverty Reduction" group to get a loan and help each other improve their income for a better life. She is requesting a loan to purchase supplies to provide a shipping goods service.

With her business profit, Phương hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to provide a shipping goods service

loans.name: N6 Thắng Tây Ngư Lộc - New Begining Group

texts.en:
Mrs Loan is 40 years old and married. She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for more than 10 years. Loan lives in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village. Moreover this region often suffers from natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea. 

She and the other members established "N6 Thắng Tây Ngư Lộc - New begining" group to get a loan and help each other improve their income for a better life. The main hardship that Loan faces is a lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase seafood to resell.

In 2014, Loan joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Loan has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. 

With her business profit, Loan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase seafood to resell

loans.name: Julita

texts.en: Julita is 68 years old. She is married with one adult son. Julita still works hard and raises hogs for an income. She also keeps a small chicken coop for additional income. She is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy piglets and feed. Julita is excited to make the most of her business with the help of the loan. Her income will be used for savings, healthy meals and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Nhóm 04, Xuân Thịnh, Yên Mỹ Group

texts.en:
Oanh has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years. She lives in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village. Moreover, the market need is low in this region. The main hardship that Oanh faces is the lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

In 2011, Oanh joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Oanh has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is the group leader of "Nhóm 04, Xuân Thịnh, Yên Mỹ" group now, which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Oanh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Celedonia

texts.en: Celedonia has a food stall, selling grilled ripe banana. Her business is doing well as she works hard for it. With her husband's help and her children's support, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family. The reason why she availed herself of another loan from PMPC is to buy more kilos of raw banana for her business. Today, Celedonia is able to retail bananas for a fast roll up of her revenue and is able to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of raw bananas for her business

loans.name: N36 Thắng Lộc Ngư Lộc - Relay Timely Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bình is 45 years old and she is married. She has had a manufacturing business sewing curtains, sheets, and pillows for more than 10 years. Bình lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in village and the market need is low in this region. 

The main hardship that Bình faces is the lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more cloth to sew curtains, sheets, and pillows to sell.

In 2009, Bình joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Bình has successfully repaid seven loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Bình hopes to buy land of her own, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth to sew curtains, sheets, and pillows to sell

loans.name: Sougrenoma Saïdou Group

texts.fr:
Mr SAÏDOU est responsable du groupe SOUGRENOMA SAÏDOU. Marié, il est père de 03enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé à 02ans. 02 vont à l'école. Il a 04personnes en charge.
Mr vend de pagnes depuis 05ans. Il s'approvisionne à OUAGADOUGOU.
Il veut s'acheter 25pièces de pagnes.
Il veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Il ambitionne scolariser ses enfants et construire une villa pour y habiter.
texts.en:
Saïdou is responsible for the Sougrenoma Saïdou group. He is married and father to three children, the eldest of whom is 12 years old and the youngest two. Two of the children go to school and Saïdou has four people in his care.

He has been selling "pagnes" (brightly colored pieces of fabric) for the past five years, and he gets his supplies in Ouagadougou. He would like to buy 25 pagnes and reinvest his profits in his business. His ambition is to be able to educate his children and build a house to live in.

loans.use: to buy 25 pieces of pagne fabric.

loans.name: Ameto

texts.fr: Mariée et âgé de 42 ans, Ameto est une femme très entreprenante et active dans la gestion de ses besoins. Avec cinq enfants à sa charge, Ameto habite à Tokoin pour vendre de la pâte bandée pour la restauration de ses clients. Ce commerce lui apporte son bénéfice et Ameto s’approvisionne deux fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs et des bols d’épices, Ameto demande ce crédit pour financer sa commande et réaliser assez de profit pour répondre favorablement aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Ameto, who is 42 years old and married, is a very enterprising woman who actively manages her needs. She has five children in her care and lives in Tokoin, where she sells strips of dough to cater for her customers. This business generates her a profit and she stocks up with goods twice a month from her suppliers. Ameto is requesting this loan to finance her order of sacks of corn and bowls of spices, so she can make sufficient profit to provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of corn and two bowls of spices.

loans.name: Anabidede

texts.fr: Anabidede est une femme mariée âgée de 36 ans. Mère de quatre enfants, Anabidede vit à Agoè pour entreprendre ses activités. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Anabidede vend des pagnes dans le quartier en se promenant afin d’avoir un revenu. Anabidede s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci d’avoir un nouveau stock, Anabidede sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des pièces de pagnes qu’elle pourra vendre et faire une bonne rentabilité afin de soutenir son mari à subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en: Anabidede is a 36-year old married woman. She is mother to four children and lives in Agoè where she carries out her activity. So that she can provide for her family's needs and get some income, Anabidede sells "pagnes" (pieces of brightly-colored fabric) walking around the neighborhood. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. In order to get new stock Anabidede is requesting this loan and will buy new pagnes that she will be able to sell and make a good profit, so that she can help her husband out with the family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy eight pagnes.

loans.name: Bénédicte

texts.fr: Agée de 32 ans, Bénédicte  est une femme mariée vivant à Agoè avec ses deux enfants à sa charge. Bénédicte est très dynamique et vend des fruits pour satisfaire favorablement ses clients. Son activité lui procure un bénéfice nécessaire pour venir en aide aux besoins de la famille. Bénédicte s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Bénédicte demande ce crédit pour commander quelques paniers d’oranges pour vendre et gagner encore plus de revenus et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Bénédicte is 32 years old, married and lives in Agoè with two children in her care. She is very dynamic and sells fruit for her customers' satisfaction. Her activity generates her sufficient profit to help out with the family's needs. Bénédicte gets her supplies three times a month from the market. She is requesting this loan so she can order a few baskets of oranges to sell and make even more money, in order to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy four baskets of oranges.

loans.name: Neb La Boumbou Group

texts.fr:
Mme  HONORINE est responsable du groupe  NEB LA BOUMBOU. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. Le plus âgé a 22 ans et le moins âgé a 15 ans. 03 enfants vont à l’école et elle a 12 personnes en charge.
Madame vend la bière de mil depuis 30 ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son quartier.
Avec l’argent octroyé, elle compte acheter 20 seaux de dolo par semaine.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour réinvestir dans son activité. Elle ambitionne s’acheter une parcelle et une moto.
texts.en:
Honorine is responsible for the Neb la Boumbou group. She is married and mother to six children, the eldest of whom is 22 years old and the youngest 15. Three of the children go to school and she has 12 dependants in total. 

She has been selling millet beer for the past 30 years and gets her supplies in the market in her neighborhood. With the money she is granted she is planning to buy 20 buckets of dolo (beer made from millet) a week. She would like to use the profits she makes as a result of this loan to reinvest in her activity. Her ambition is to buy a plot of land and a motorbike.

loans.use: to buy 20 buckets of dolo (beer made from millet) per week.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in replacement parts and tools for his bicycle repair shop.

loans.name: Shirley Patricia

texts.es: Shirley en compañía de su cónyuge y sus hijos, habita en un barrio ubicado en el municipio de Malambo y desde la comodidad de su vivienda elabora postres que comercializa entre sus vecinos y conocidos.  Su idea de negocio surgió por la necesidad de generar recursos para su familia y a pesar que inició con un escaso capital ha logrado tener éxito gracias a las exquisiteces que elabora.  Ella se dedica a esta actividad todos los días a partir de las 8 a.m. hasta las 4 p.m., así mismo comparte su tiempo entre las labores de su hogar y su negocio. Shirley está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en materias primas para la elaboración de sus postres; harina, cremas, leche, esencias y demás.  Esta inversión pretende dinamizar las ventas en pro de generar más ingresos.  Su meta a futuro es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Shirley lives in a neighborhood in the town of Malambo with  her husband and children. From the comfort of her home, she makes and sells desserts to her neighbors and acquaintances. Her business idea was born of the necessity of generating resources for her family. despite starting with little capital she has been successful thanks to the delicious things she makes. She works at this activity every day from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m., She also divides her time between her housework and her business. Shirley is applying for her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will invest it in ingredients to make her desserts: flour, cream, milk, flavorings and more. This investment is intended to drive sales and generate more income. Her goal for the future is to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in ingredients to make desserts: flour, cream, milk, flavorings and more.

loans.name: Albani Paola

texts.es: Albani de 27 años, aperturó su venta de comidas rápidas ubicada en la terraza de su vivienda en el municipio de Soledad, ella laboró durante varios años como empleada y al quedar cesante tomo la iniciativa de crear su propio negocio, el éxito no se hizo esperar, todos los días sus vecinos que son sus principales clientes pueden pasar a degustar de las delicias que ella prepara; perros calientes, hamburguesas, sándwiches, papas fritas y demás.  Su principal desafío fue no contar con medios de financiación y con un capital insuficiente pero a través de una solicitud de crédito, está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar panes, embutidos, quesos y demás.  Su meta a futuro será mejorar la imagen de su negocio para hacerlo más atractivo.
texts.en: Albani is 27 years old. She opened her fast food business on the terrace of her home in the town of Soledad. She worked for several years as an employee and when she was laid off took the initiative of creating her own business. Success didn't make her wait. Every day, neighbors, who are her main customers, can pass by to taste the delicious things she makes: hot dogs, hamburgers, sandwiches, french fries, and more. Her main challenge was not having the way to finance and not having enough capital. But with a loan application, she is asking for a Kiva loan, the first loan she has taken out with the  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will buy bread, deli meats, cheeses and more. Her goal for the future will be to improve her business' image to make it more attractive.

loans.use: to buy bread, deli meats, cheeses and more.

loans.name: Columna De Fuego Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario columna de fuego lo integran dos microempresarias exitosa y un señor laborioso, el grupo es coordinado por mercedes de 33 años de edad, casada y madre de un niño, es propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio en donde ofrece una amplia variedad de productos, es el cuarto ciclo en el que solicitan crédito en ADIM, con los créditos anteriores logro comprar un carro de segunda mano, que le ha permitido realizar las gestiones de su negocio. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, avena, gaseosa y leche, la segunda socia es loredana de 34 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de pan y repostería, el tercer socio es don juan que se dedica a la venta de lubricantes.
texts.en: The Columna de Fuego support group is made up of two successful women and a hardworking man. The group is coordinated by Mercedes, who is 33 years old, married and the mother of a son. She has a store in her home where she offers a wide variety of products. This is the fourth cycle they have asked for a loan in ADIM. With the previous loans, she was able to buy a second hand car, which has allowed her to do business activities. She is asking for a loan to buy rice, sugar, oil, oatmeal, sodas and milk. The second borrower is Loredana, who is 34 and sells bread and pastries, and the third borrower is Juan, who sells lubricants.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, oatmeal, sodas and milk.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 64 years old; married with eight children.

Gloria works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

She has been running the general store for 13 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Gloria aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en:
Robinah is a married mother of two children and all have attended school. She does not have additional family members. 

She operates a beauty salon and has been in this business for three years. She works in the market seven days a week and sells on a retail basis. She has requested for a loan from MCDT - SACCO to buy weaves, braids, treatments, oils, and relaxers. Her major business challenges include power shortages.

She is aspires to own a fully-stocked salon. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent, food, and school fees.

loans.use: to buy hair relaxers, treatments, oils, weaves, and braids

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel is 53 years old, married to Teresa and supports a family of 5 children. 

He has been practicing small scale farming for the last 25 years earning KES 18,000 per month. 

Samwel has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy farm input and certified seeds for planting for high production crops to earn more income.
 
He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to expand his farming activities. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy farm input and certified seeds for planting for high production crops to earn more income.

loans.name: Thiệu Trung - Overcoming Difficulties Group

texts.en:
Thắm is 28 years old and she is married. Thắm lives in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. She has had a retail business selling dry food and general things for 1 year.

Her family is in a low-income household in the village. The market need is low in this region. The main hardship that Thắm faces is lack of capital. She and other members established the "Thiệu Trung - Overcoming difficulties" group to get loans and to share business experience to improve their income for a better life.

She is requesting a loan to purchase pots to resell. This is Thắm's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Thắm hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase pots to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk

loans.name: N10 Đông Vệ - Dynamic Women Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hà is 30 years old and she is married
 
She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling beer, soft drinks, and milk for five years. Hà lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this job is unstable.

The main hardship that Hà faces is lack of capital. She and other members established the "N10 Đông Vệ - Dynamic women" solidarity group to get loans and share business experience to raise income. She is requesting a loan to purchase more beer, soft drinks, and milk to resell. 

Hà joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution in 2012. She has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profit, Hà hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more beer, soft drinks, and milk to resell

loans.name: Nuzhat

texts.en:
Nuzhat  is 43 years old, a married woman, and a mother of three children. She is shown in the photo with her husband. She has been involved in a tailoring business for many years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of the household as well as the educational needs of children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

Now she has requested for a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR  to purchase a new stitching machine along with spools of threads and laces for meeting orders on time. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Nuzhat  hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine along with spools of threads and laces for meeting orders on time

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en: Shabana is a 40-year-old, married woman. She is been involved in the business of cloth trade. She purchases a variety of cloth at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. Shabana  has requested a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR. She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get a boost in her earnings with her loan

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get a boost in her earnings with her loan

loans.name: N42 Thắng Lộc Ngư Lộc - Fly Shrimps Group

texts.en:
Mrs Bám is 58 years old and she is married.
 
She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for more than 10 years. Bám lives in the Hau Loc district, a rural town in the Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in village; moreover, this region often suffers from natural disasters, such as storms, because it is near the sea.  The main hardship that Bám faces is lack of capital.  

In 2009, Bám joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Bám has successfully repaid 7 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is requesting a loan to purchase seafood to resell now. The "N42 Thắng Lộc Ngư Lộc - Fly shrimps" group hopes that their fresh seafood is always sold well.

With her business profit, Bám wishes to buy a motorbike, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase seafood to resell

loans.name: Maria Jeronima

texts.es:
María Jeronima tiene 56 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

María Jeronima se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, patos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 25 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la mejora de la infraestructura de su corral, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales. Con esto espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Jeronima is 56 years old, she is married and lives with her husband in a rural area of the district of Cayaltí, which is found in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this area earn a living mainly though agriculture, cattle raising and commerce.

María Jeronima works raising and selling small animals such a guinea pigs, hens, and ducks and runs her business from her home. She has 25 years experience and has a very good personal and business reputation in the area. The loan she is asking for will be used to improve the infrastructure of her pens, as well as buying balanced feed for her animals. With this she hopes to offer a better product to her customers and ultimately increase her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of her pens, and buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk in the area for more income gain

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a bull for slaughter inorder to sell the meat to his clients for more income gain

loans.name: Hiền

texts.en:
Mrs Hiền is 20 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry, for six years. Hiền lives in the Thieu Hoa district, a semi-urban town in the Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover the market need is low in this region. She has no collateral because she can't get a loan from the other banks or credit institutions.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

In 2014, Hiền joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Hiền has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profit, Hiền hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops in her farm for a better harvest for family use and sale to clients in the market.

loans.name: Enny Elena

texts.es:
Enny Elena tiene 24 años de edad,madre soltera con un hijo, vive con su familia en en el distrito de OYOTUN, en una zona rural, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, en la Costa Norte de Perú.En dicho distrito la mayoría de pobladores se dedica a las labores agrícolas, comercio y crianza de animales menores.

Ella se dedica a brindar los servicios de limpieza, contando con herramientas propias, con más de 1 año de experiencia en el negocio, negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio; solicita préstamo para activo fijo, y la inversión le servirá para tener más herramientas para el negocio,como escobas, recogedores, desinfectantes, guantes, entre otros, en mejorar su negocio; Enny Elena piensa mejorar calidad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Enny Elena is 24 years old and is a single mother with a child. She lives with her family in the district of Oyoton in a rural area. This is in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the North coast of Peru. In this district the majority of the population make a living through agricultural labour, trade and through raising young animals. 

She makes a living providing cleaning services. She has her own tools and more than one year's experience in the business, which is located in her home. She is asking for loan for fixed assets, and she will use the investment to buy more tools for her business, such as brooms, dustpans, disinfectants, gloves and other items, in order to improve her business. Enny Elena is hoping to improve the quality of her services so that she can meet the diverse needs of her customers in the area.

loans.use: to buy more tools for her business such as brooms, dustpans, disinfectants, gloves and other items

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of three children. She is working hard to fulfill their needs, including food, health, clothing, and education. 

She, with her husband (also shown in the photo), has been doing the work of agriculture for some years. They grow different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

In order to purchase different types of seeds, insecticides and pesticides, currently Shazia has applied for a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR. This would help her to grow more crops which ultimately help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 53 years old, married, and has four children. Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine has a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, canned goods, noodles and other groceries. 

Josephine requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

In the future Josephine would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with eight children. Seven of her children are in school.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like charcoal retailing and pig fattening businesses.

Leonora dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell

loans.name: Nguyen

texts.en:
Nguyen is 45 years old, married and has four children. Two of them are schooling. 

She would like to improve her family’s living standards, especially her children's, but she lacks capital. 

This loan can help her to build a sanitation latrine, and she is able to repay the loan from cultivation and selling chickens in her yard.

loans.use: To build a latrine to improve the health of her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops in her farm for a better harvest for family use and sale to clients in the market.

loans.name: Kwefaako Nalukolongo Group

texts.en:
Josephine, who is 46, is married and has five children. Josephine is standing at the extreme left in the photograph. She shares her home with her husband, who works as a mechanic, and her two youngest children, who are still studying. She is a good mother and is enterprising, independent, determined, committed, responsible and very hardworking. 
 
Her desire to excel led her to lead a group of people engaged in different types of businesses, including weaving, selling eggs, selling fish, selling spices, selling cosmetics and selling food, to ask for a loan in order to improve their businesses. 

Her business is selling second-hand clothes, such as skirts, sweatshirts, t-shirts, dresses, blouses, sweaters, jackets, etc. She works in the city outskirts, where there is demand for used clothing because of the low standards of living of the people. She needs to supply her business with a variety and large quantity of clothing constantly to compete in the market. She also wants to open another stall selling the same items in another market. 

"My business needs to increase its stock in order to grow, and the profits will go towards opening another stall," she says. The advantage of her business is that the sales are constant, but the disadvantage is that she doesn't have the necessary capital to expand her business. Her dream is to have two market stalls, and she wants to invest in buying second-hand clothing wholesale. 

Josephine has been in business for two years and this is her first loan cycle with UGAFODE. She is asking for a loan to buy second-hand clothing to sell. She and the group members appreciate the financial boost and partnership.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Gabriela De Jesus

texts.es: Gabriela de 45 años de edad quien habita en vivienda propia en compañía de su esposo y sus dos hijas de 15 y 24 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo y el apoyo de su esposo ha sacado adelante a sus hijas, Gabriela tiene en su casa una tortillería que atiende todos los días, además los fines de semana elabora pupusas, gracias a su amabilidad ha logrado hacerse de muchos clientes que la recomiendan, también cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposo y su hija mayor. Gabriela desea mejorar su negocio por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: una plancha para pupusas, maíz, chicharrón, queso, frijoles, repollo, tomates, etc.
texts.en:
Gabriela is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and her two children who are 15 and 24 years old. She is a very hard-working woman who, with a great deal of effort and the support of her husband, has carried her daughters forward. 

In her house Gabriela makes tortilla products every day, even at the weekends. She makes stuffed tortillas, and thanks to her friendly manner she has managed to gain many customers who would recommend her. She also has the economic support of her husband and her eldest daughter. 

Gabriela hopes to improve her business, which is why she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in: a griddle for making stuffed tortillas, corn, meat rind, cheese, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.

loans.use: to invest in: a griddle for making stuffed tortillas, corn, meat rind, cheese, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: N1 Tiên Thắng Quảng Lợi - Funny Women Group

texts.en:
Nhàn is 32 years old and she is married. Nhàn lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household.
 
She has had a retail business selling animal feed for more than 10 years, but the market need is low in this region. The main hardship that Nhàn faces is lack of capital. 

Nhàn is a reputable person in the community. In 2013, Nhàn joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Nhàn has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. 

She is group leader of the "N1 Tiên Thắng Quảng Lợi - Funny women" solidarity group. She is requesting a loan to purchase animal food to resell.

Nhàn hopes for her business to do well so that she can to make enough money to provide for her children and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase animal food to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for higher production and income gain.

loans.name: 09 - Tây Ga - Phường Phú Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hào is 63 years old and is married.  She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables for more than 10 years.
Hào lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Although her family is a low-income household in village, she is a reputable person in the community. 

Hào is the group leader of the 09 - Tây Ga - Phường Phú Sơn solidarity group. This is Hào first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell.

With her business profit, Hào hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 03_Thôn 7_Đông Anh _Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs Tám has a retail business selling aluminum furniture. She is requesting a loan to purchase a machine and materials to expand her aluminum furniture making store.  Tám has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Tám is 36 years old and she is married with 3 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 03_Thôn 7_Đông Anh _Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2013, Tám joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institutionn to improve her  business. Tám has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  The main hardship that Tám faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tám hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase a machine and materials to expand her aluminum furniture making store

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is a 43-year-old working woman. She is shown in the photo with her son. 

After her marriage, she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition. So she started a business of selling clothes. She believes she can earn some respect and make a better world for her children and fund their education. 

Samina is famous among her neighbors for her collections and has a good client list. 

Currently, she needs a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment. This would lead her to live a decent life and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a solar electricity system

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina is a 55-year-old, vigorous, married woman. She has had a business of hand embroidery for many years. She knows the art of making beautiful embroidery patterns with beads and pearls. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong.  But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. 

Her husband does not earn enough to support his family well alone. Sakina’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street, and she is the best earning resource in her household. 

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand on the upcoming eve of Eid-ul-Fitr (Muslims' festival celebrated after the month of Holy Ramadan).

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for top dressing her crops.

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru: Иброхим доброжелательный молодой парень. Ему 24 года, он  учится в магистратуре. Он неженат. Иброхим живет с родителями в кишлаке. Он работает в банке. Всё что он зарабатывает расходует на содержание семьи. У него нет возможности накопить денег для других целей. Он должен оплачивать за учебу в ВУЗе. Но у него не хватает денежных средств и для этого он обратился в ООО МДО Арванд за получение кредита с целью оплаты за учебу. Он очень благодарен МДО "Арванд" за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Ibrohim is a friendly young guy. He is 24 and is studying for his master's degree. He is not married. Ibrohim lives with his parents in a small village and works at a bank. Everything that he earns is put toward household expenses and he does not have the opportunity to save money to put toward other goals. He needs to pay his university tuition but does not have enough money, so he applied for a loan with MDO Arvand to pay his tuition. He is very grateful to MDO Arvand for their support and trust.

loans.use: to pay for his education

loans.name: N1 Quảng Hưng -Women Do Business Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lương is 33 years old, and she is married. 
 
She has had a retail business selling dry food and general things for five years. Lương lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this job is unstable. 

The main hardship that Lương faces is lack of capital. Before she joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution, her family circumstances were very difficult. In 2013, Lương joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. 

She and other members established the "N1 Quảng Hưng - Women Do Business" group determined to overcome difficulties. Lương has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cakes, sweets, sugar and milk to resell.

From her business profit, Lương hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more cakes, sweets, sugar and milk to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a water source at their home to improve access to water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a new and standard butchery to attract more customers and earn more income.

loans.name: Mónica Isabel

texts.es: Mónica de 43 años es una polifacética mujer dedicada a varias actividades generadoras de ingresos para su familia; incursionó en el comercio con el acompañamiento de un familiar que le facilitó un crédito y la recomendó ante potenciales clientes. Tiempo después se incorporó a una empresa de ventas por intermedio de catálogos para ofrecer productos de belleza y artículos de aseo del hogar, así mismo también ofrece servicios como estilista a domicilio.  Mónica cuenta con 13 años de experiencia y una clientela fidelizada, a quienes puede atender todos los días en cualquier horario.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo que invertirá en productos para el aseo, artículos de tocador y de belleza.  Ella es madre de dos hijos menores de edad a quienes desea ofrecer una educación académica de calidad y mejorar sus condiciones actuales al adquirir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Monica is 43 years old, multifaceted woman who provides for her family through various income generating activities. She ventured in commerce with the help of a family member who loaned her a credit and recommended her to potential clients. After some time she joined a catalog sales company to offer beauty products and house cleaning products, she also provided in-home stylist services.
Monica has 13 years of experience and a loyal clientele who she can serve all day at any hour. Currently she is applying for her first credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo foundation which she will invest in cleaning products, toiletries and beauty products. 
She is the mother of two children, not yet of age, who she wants to provide an academic education for. She also wants to improve their current conditions by acquiring her own home.

loans.use: invest in cleaning products, toiletries and beauty products

loans.name: N8 Hoạch Phúc Thphúc - New Begining Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hân is 45 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry, for more than 10 years.

Hân lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the market need is low in this region. She has no collateral because she can't get a loan from other banks or credit institutions. The main hardship that Hân faces is lack of capital.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future. This is Hân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

With her business profit, Hân hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Saabra

texts.en:
Saabra is 43 years old and a married woman. She is a mother of five children. Her husband has been doing a business of animal sales and purchasing for many years. Saabra fully supports and assists her husband with his work. 

Now, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan amount  to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She desires to improve her standard of living through all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 39 años de edad, es casado tiene una linda familia de seis hijos de las edades entre 5 y 22 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Francisco para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos trabaja como encargado de construcción, él ya tiene  9 años de realizar esta labor, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la agricultura sembrando una serie de verduras que su tierra produce.
Francisco con el afán de tener donde cultivar ahora solicita un préstamo para poder aprovechar un terreno que ahora le están ofreciendo, pues él desde hace algún tiempo había pesado en realizar esta compra pero no había tenido una buena oportunidad, Francisco espera contar con el crédito para poder adquirir su terreno y seguir incrementado el patrimonio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 39 year old man, he is married and has a beautiful family that includes six children ages 5 through 22. This humble family lives in a community in Solola. Francisco, in order to help his children get ahead, works as a a construction supervisor. He has been doing this job for 9 years, but in an effort to improve his incomes he also works in agriculture, planting a series of vegetables native to his land. 
Francisco, eager to have a place to grow, is requesting a loan to take advantage of a piece of land which he is being offered. He has been thinking about making this purchase for some time now, but had not had a good opportunity. He hopes to get the credit, allowing him to acquire the piece of land and continue increasing his children's estate

loans.use: purchase land to planting

loans.name: Ngan

texts.en: Mrs. Ngan is 35 years old and married. She has three children under the age of 18. She would like to improve her living standard, especially for her children, but she lacks capital. This loan can help her build a hygienic latrine. Farming and animal husbandry are the main income sources of her family, and she will be able to pay the loan monthly. In the picture, she stands in front of her temporary toilet with her young child.

loans.use: To build a latrine to improve the health of her family

loans.name: Khairan

texts.en: Khairan is 50 years old, married, and the mother of four children. She has been involved in animal sales for many years along with her husband (also shown in the photo). She works everyday to provide her family with the basic necessities of life. Now, she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She desires to improve her standard of living through all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market

loans.name: Saada 1 Group

texts.en: Amira is the featured borrower for Saada 1 Group whose members are neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses. Amira is a 42-year-old widowed mother of five children. She started almost a year ago selling clothes to cover her children's needs and expenses. She is her children's only breadwinner, and she is trying hard to provide them with a decent life. Today, Amira is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop her business by increasing her merchandise with a new collection of summer clothes to satisfy her customers' needs. Amira is the first lady on the right of the photo. With respect to the other group members, Ikram is the lady standing in the middle, and Saada is the first lady on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of summer clothes

loans.name: Nhóm 03 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Loan is 32 years old and she is married. She has had a manufacturing business making wood furniture for six years.

Loan lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this job is unstable. The main hardship that Loan faces is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase material to make wood furniture for sale.

In 2012, Loan joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Loan has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

Along with her business profit, Loan hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase material to make wood furniture for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy laminated sheeting, wood and nails to replace the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use.

loans.name: Milkah

texts.en:
Milkah is 50 years old, is married and supports 6 children. She is a small-scale farmer earning an income of KES 15,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to set up a cow shed for her livestock. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and improve the family's living standards. 

Her hope is to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: To set up a cow shed for her livestock.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: Tomas de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus 2 hermanas, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz y frijol) posee 11 años de experiencia en la actividad, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, el  esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumo como fertilizantes, herbicidas e insecticida para continuar con sus cultivos y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Tomas is 64 years old and he lives in his own house with his two sisters. He works growing basic grains (corn and beans) and he has eleven years experience in this business. He sells his product in the various markets close to his home. He is requesting a loan to buy inputs like fertilizer, herbicide and insecticide. to continue with his growing and thus have higher economic income.

loans.use: to buy inputs like fertilizer, herbicide and insecticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to supply milk in the market for income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for top dressing her crops on her farm for a better harvest for family use and to sell to clients in the market.

loans.name: Sameha

texts.en: Sameha is married and has 2 children. Her husband works in a company in Cairo. After her father's death, Sameha became responsible for her mother. She started a small beauty salon and a dress rental project to help her husband with the family income. She is requesting a 5,000 EGP loan to buy more dresses to increase her income for her family and to guarantee better living conditions for her children and her mother.

loans.use: To buy more dresses for rental.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts to maintain and repair his motorcycle to enable him to offer better transport services to clients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides, etc. in order to increase her production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start poultry farming and supply poultry products for more income gain.

loans.name: N1  Quảng Thành - Safe Vegetable Group

texts.en:
Mrs Trâm, 42 years old, is married. She has worked in agriculture, farming food for more than 10 years. Trâm lives in Thanh Hoa city in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household and her job is unstable. 

Trâm's main business hardship is lack of capital. She and other members established the "N1  Quảng Thành - Safe vegetable" group to get a loan and to raise income from their gardens. Trâm is requesting a loan to purchase seed and supplies to farm crops.

Trâm is a reputable person in the community. Although this is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution, all members agreed to elect her as leader of their solidarity group. With her business profit, Trâm hopes for her children to find good jobs, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase seed and supplies to farm crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for top dressing his crops in his farm so as to get a better produce for family use.

loans.name: Zohrak

texts.en:
Zohrak, his wife and their three-year-old son live in Meghrashen village of Shirak region. Zohrak's parents and sister left the country with the hope of finding a living as migrant workers. At first, it was very difficult for Zohrak to maintain his farming work without his father's support, but due to his and his wife's hard work, they are now able to successfully run the farm. 

Zohrak is mostly involved in land cultivation (he grows wheat, potatoes, cherries, walnuts and apples). He takes the gathered harvest to the local market and sells it. 

Zohrak decided to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer. This will enable him to prepare his farm for cultivation works and have a harvest in the winter. 

Because the region where Zohrak's village is located is considered poor, and the unemployment rate here is very high, people face numerous difficulties in developing their businesses. Zohrak's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the under-served population of the Shirak region, to help them to access the market and earn a living. 

Zohrak hopes to receive lenders' support and enlarge his agribusiness so his family will have a better life.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds and fertilizer to start cultivation works and be prepared for the winter harvest

loans.name: Ismael

texts.en: Ismael is 50 years old, married, and has four children. He is an electrician and is requesting a 2,000 EGP loan to buy modern electricians' tools such as cables, cable glands, and testers to expand his business and increase his income for his family.

loans.use: To buy modern electricians' tools such as cables, cable glands, and testers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes and hand bags for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
