Jacinta aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery stock to sell.

loans.name: Alejandro Cesar

texts.es:
La pasión por los avances tecnológicos, llevaron a Alejandro de veinte años de edad, estudiar Técnico medio en computación para prepararse y convertirse en uno de los mejores en el país. La dedicación y el amor por la tecnología lo han llevado a trabajar y estudiar todos los domingos en el área que desea, pues trabaja como técnico en una empresa desde hace dos años. Él cuenta que los días no siente que trabaja, siente que se divierte haciendo lo que le gusta.
Actualmente está en segundo año de la carrera y es uno de los mejores en su clase. De manera que su madre se siente orgullosa de apoyarlo con el cincuenta por ciento de sus estudios y el otro lo paga él con todo orgullo. Por esta razón, él decide solicitar un préstamo para comprar una computadora, puesto que le ayudaría en su trabajo y es las tareas de sus clases. Esto le permitirá concluir sus estudios con honores y graduarse como lo desea. En un futuro desea tener su propio negocio y hacer una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
His passion for technology led 20-year old Alejandro to study information technology and he hopes eventually to become one of the best technicians in the country. His dedication and love for computers means that he works and studies even on Sundays. He has also been working as a technician in a business for two years. Alejandro says that his work does not feel like work as he is doing what he enjoys. 

Now he is in the second year of his course and one of the best in his class. His mother is proud to help him with 50% of his fees, and he pays the rest. To help him with his work and studies, Alejandro has decided to seek a loan to buy a computer. Then he will be able to finish his course with the high grades he so wishes. In the future he would like to have his own business and earn a university degree.

loans.use: buy a computer

loans.name: Basilio's Group

texts.en: Basilio is a farmer who lives in the locality of Chirimoyo in the Mexican state of Guerrero. Chirimoyo has less than 200 residents, where most of them work as farmers. Chirimoyo is a locality that cultivates corn during the whole year and Basilio is one of the farmers. Basilio's house has access to electricity but he wants to purchase a solar system because his actual service is deficient and also with a solar system he would save around $100 Mexican pesos every month.

loans.use: to purchase a solar system because the actual electricity service is deficient and to save money.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rowena is 34 years old and has three children who are in school.

Rowena has a broom-making business in the Philippines. Rowena requested a 7,000 Philippines Peso (PHP) loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed like bamboo sticks and other items

Rowena has been in this business for six years. In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials needed like bamboo sticks and other items.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Cansado de buscar trabajo un día cualquiera Diego tomo la decisión de emprender su negocio, tenía unos conocimientos empíricos en la cocina rápida y con un préstamo y mucho entusiasmo inicio su actividad, trabajando principalmente fines de semana que son los días donde se ven las ventas.

Comprar una vivienda propia es el sueño de Diego y lo quiere lograr con su negocio, ese pequeño puesto de venta de alimento que le ha dado el sustento para su hogar estos años y ahora se siente muy feliz pues tiene la oportunidad de ver crecer su negocio.

Diego quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar lo siguiente:
•	Una carpa 
•	Tres mesas
•	Sillas
•	Pipetas de Gas
•	insumos
•	nevera
•	un pc portátil para ambientar con música los alimentos.
Este préstamo serviría de impulso para agrandar el negocio del señor Diego apóyalo, dale la oportunidad de crecer con tu ayuda.
texts.en:
Tired of looking for work, Diego decided one day to start his own business. He had some empirical knowledge about preparing fast food, and with a loan and a lot of enthusiasm, started his business. He works mostly on weekends because those are the days when sales are good. 

Diego's dream is to buy his own house, and he hopes his business, this little food stand that has supported his household in these years, will enable him to realize this dream. Today, he is very happy because he has the chance to see his business grow.  

Diego would like to request a loan to buy the following:
•	an awning 
•	three tables
•	chairs
•	gas burners
•	supplies
•	a refrigerator 
•	a laptop computer to complement his food with a musical ambiance.

This loan will be a stimulus to expand Diego's business. Give him the opportunity to improve his business with your help.

loans.use: to buy an awning, three tables, chairs, gas burners, supplies, a refrigerator, and a laptop computer.
